channel.title: [Reward/12Rep+]Help Me Please! [Adding Files To Webhost] [12Rep+]
channel.description: Sooo sum1 designed/made a website for my rsps called: Rune Matter. He sent me the files, how do I upload these to my/a webhost? Reward: 12Rep++

item.title: [Reward/12Rep+]Help Me Please! [Adding Files To Webhost] [12Rep+]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Do you have a budget at all?

item.title: [Reward/12Rep+]Help Me Please! [Adding Files To Webhost] [12Rep+]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:4, topic:458742”][quote author=I_Hybrid_I link=topic=561651.msg4096690#msg4096690 date=1346942481]

My suggestion would be to download an FTP client (I recommend FileZilla) or connect to the FTP server using Windows Explorer. Get your web host’s FTP details and then connect; from there on, FileZilla is pretty much a drag and drop process.

By the way, you cannot give twelve rep points. You have 200 rep at the moment and:

rep_given = floor(get_rep() / 15);
would give thirteen rep points.

oh lol.
Well, my laptop is broken and I can’t download/install anything on this pc coz its from my parents.
If anyone has an FTP client and would do this for me I would love him forever! haha
[/quote]
in windows explorer, type this:

ftp://your_server_url_here.whatever

it should ask you for credentials; enter them.[/quote]
Not sure what you mean, I dont got a website yet? lol soz, I’ve NEVER done this before and my knowledge with this is 0.01% add my skype or msn (blessed.city & dutchreality317@hotmail.com)

Read full topic

item.title: [Reward/12Rep+]Help Me Please! [Adding Files To Webhost] [12Rep+]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:3, topic:458742”][quote author=Whackatre link=topic=561651.msg4096672#msg4096672 date=1346939763]
My suggestion would be to download an FTP client (I recommend FileZilla) or connect to the FTP server using Windows Explorer. Get your web host’s FTP details and then connect; from there on, FileZilla is pretty much a drag and drop process.

By the way, you cannot give twelve rep points. You have 200 rep at the moment and:

rep_given = floor(get_rep() / 15);
would give thirteen rep points.
[/quote]
oh lol.
Well, my laptop is broken and I can’t download/install anything on this pc coz its from my parents.
If anyone has an FTP client and would do this for me I would love him forever! haha[/quote]
in windows explorer, type this:

ftp://your_server_url_here.whatever

it should ask you for credentials; enter them.

Read full topic
